name: PsyBurst
description: Psyburst is an action side scroller, featuring 8 unique characters with many different skills. It's a hybird between sidescroller and fighting game. Play as hunters and slash your way trough your opponent.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
